Title: Equestrian Clan
ChangeLog:
Version 1.1.0:

 * Bug fix: Fixed a tooltip error with Heart's Desire.

 * Clarified that Heart's Desire and Poison Joke do not trigger Rally effects. (They never did, but now it says so.)

 * New mutator: Scrapbook. You can no longer skip for money.

 New mutator: Dendrophilia. Start with the Bloomberg relic (all unit drafts gain a largestone).

 * New mutator: Unstable Matter. 33% chance that your units explode when played, dealing 50 damage to everyone.

 * New Mutator: No Respite. An extra wave spawns before minor bosses.

 * New mutator: Want It Need It. All spells gain Holdover.

 * New Mutator: Equalizer. When you play a spell, each different spell in hand is consumed and replaced by a copy of that spell.

* New Expert Challenge: Hoarding. 'You get twice the rewards and can't skip but at least your lads are like trees.'

 * New Expert Challenge: One Trick Pony. 'Your foes are unrelenting and you're stuck in a rut.'



 *** Balance Adjustments ***

 * Background Pony base health reduced to 12 from 15. Essence unchanged.

 * Jestember essence redesigned. It now gives +10 attack and immunities to Emberdrain and Sap.

 * Guardian of the Gates essence stats reduced to +60 hp, +20 attack, Multistrike 1, +3 size; from +75 hp, +25 attack, Multistrike 1, +3 size. 

 * Mare You Know essence adjusted. Bonus stats removed and replaced with Sap 8. The resolve trigger of drawing a card and reducing the cost remains unchanged.

 * Tweaked the dialog for the refusal option on the Flower Pony cavern event. This event also appears slightly less frequently.
